text: John Knapton (fl. 1406–1433), of Cambridge, was an English politician. He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Cambridge in 1406, 1415, 1419 and 1431. Knapton was mayor of Cambridge from 1432 to 1433.http://www.historyofparliamentonline.org/volume/1386-1421/member/knapton- john ==References== Category:14th-century births Category:15th-century deaths Category:English MPs 1406 Category:English MPs 1415 Category:Mayors of Cambridge Category:English MPs 1419 Category:English MPs 1431
title: John Knapton (politician)
